attributes.action: prosecute to the letter of the Law, MPs, their staff and families who, through evidence, have been found to have made fraudulent expenses claims, staffing claims and any other monetary expenditure that has lead to personal gain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In any other working sector, if an employee has been found to have made fraudulent claims in order to gain personally, they are prosecuted, black listed and ordered to pay back said monies, fined and/or imprisoned.  WHY should MPs be above the law in this regard?

Anyone entrusted to see that the needs of their constituents are met, who abuses the privilege, should be prosecuted to the letter of the law.  No Ifs, No Buts....

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
